short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to add elements to dashboards at DashboardMix.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is the official extension for DashboardMix.com.

With this extension, you can add items like images, text, charts, and graphs from any website to your dashboard on DashboardMix. For elements requiring a more complex workflow, the extension also allows you to capture and simulate user actions/steps seamlessly. Additionally, the extension keeps your dashboard updated by regularly checking for new information at specified intervals.
